queries.query: large stormy dragon that can fly and uses wind attacks
queries.variant: large draconic creature that's stormy and capable of flying with wind abilities

queries.variant: dragon with chaotic alignment, impressive strength, and immune to lightning

queries.variant: dragon exhibiting fast flight capabilities and a powerful bludgeoning breath

queries.variant: creature that manipulates storm powers and is able to bite and slash with claws

queries.variant: creature proficient in acrobatics and able to see through fog or mist
